Scheduler Type
Configuration

Configuration values for CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE. More...

Collaboration diagram for Scheduler Type:

Defines

#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_COOPERATIVE   0
 Use this option to use the OS in cooperative mode only.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_COMPARE   2
 Use the internal compare feature to generate the scheduler interrupts. Using this configuration, will affect the internal cycle counter value.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_RTC   1
 Use the RTC peripheral to generate the scheduler interrupts.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_TC   3
 Use the TC peripheral to generate the scheduler interrupts.

Detailed Description

Configuration values for CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE.
